data.title: Miliyah Kato to cover Hikaru Utada, RADWIMPS, Namie Amuro, Shiina Ringo, Fujii Kaze, & more for new album
data.meta_description: Singer Miliyah Kato has announced the release of her very first cover album titled "COVERS – WOMAN & MAN-". As indicated by the title Kato will be covering a…
data.text:
Singer Miliyah Kato has announced the release of her very first cover album titled “COVERS – WOMAN & MAN-“. As indicated by the title Kato will be covering a variety of songs from both male and female artists, she has separated the covers for a two disc collection.

Disc 1 will contain female covers and opening the album is Shiina Ringo‘s classic song “Honnou”. Namie Amuro, Kumi Koda, and Cocco are other artists whom Kato will be covering. Disc 2 opens with King Gnu‘s hit “Teenage Forever”, and will feature covers from RADWIMPS, Dragon Ash, and Fujii Kaze. Check out the full tracklist below:

Disc 1

Honnou (Original: Shiina Ringo)

Can You Keep A Secret? (Original: Hikaru Utada)

Don’t wanna cry (Original: Namie Amuro)

Soba ni Iru ne (Original: Themla Aoyama feat.SoulJa)

STARS (Original: Mika Nakashima)

TAKE BACK (Original: Kumi Koda )

Tsuyoku Hakanai Mono-tachi (Original: Cocco)

Disc 2

Teenager Forever (Original: King Gnu)

Hanataba no Kawari ni Melody wo (Original: Shota Shimizu)

Yasashisa (優しさ) (Original: Fujii Kaze)

me me she (Original: RADWIMPS)

BABY BABY (Original: GING NANG BOYZ)

Ikareta Baby (Original: Fishmans)

Yuri no Saku Basho de (Original: Dragon Ash)

OH MY LITTLE GIRL (Original: Yutaka Ozaki )

The limited edition of the album will come with a bonus DVD featuring the live “Special Acoustic Session -Uta no Kai 2020-“. COVERS – WOMAN & MAN- will be released on November 25th, 2020.
